rooms.description: Spacious entry area to welcome guests, adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy.
Seamless integration of kitchen and living space with modern fixtures and ergonomic design. Large windows ensure natural light, aligned with Vastu guidelines for balance.
Multi-purpose space accommodating a home office or studio workspace. Provides privacy while still connected to the open-plan area.
Well-ventilated bathroom with functional layout, ensuring comfort and hygiene in accordance with local standards.

openings.details: Wide doorways for accessibility, designed per Vastu recommendations to facilitate a smooth flow of energy.
Large windows for abundant natural light and ventilation. Placement optimized based on local sun path and Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, designed to promote rest and relaxation. Vastu-aligned placement ensures balance.
Dual-purpose room functioning as a home theater for entertainment and a guest bedroom when required, ensuring luxury and versatility.

openings.location: Between Ground Floor and First Floor
openings.details: Sturdy staircase designed to ensure easy mobility, meeting both safety standards and Vastu principles of flow.

notes: The design integrates industrial aesthetics with farmhouse charm on both floors.
An emphasis is placed on open-plan spaces and multi-functional rooms to accommodate joint family needs.
Considerations for local building norms, luxury specifications, and Vastu principles have been incorporated.
